info.description:
=============================
Pos Ticket Salesman Firstname
=============================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png
    :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status
    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png
    :target: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0-standalone.html
    :alt: License: AGPL-3
.. |badge3| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-OCA%2Fpos-lightgray.png?logo=github
    :target: https://github.com/OCA/pos/tree/12.0/pos_ticket_salesman_firstname
    :alt: OCA/pos
.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png
    :target: https://translation.odoo-community.org/projects/pos-12-0/pos-12-0-pos_ticket_salesman_firstname
    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png
    :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/184/12.0
    :alt: Try me on Runbot

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

On the POS ticket, prints only the salesman's first name.

.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OCA/pos/12.0/pos_ticket_salesman_firstname/static/description/receipt.png

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

#. Go to *Point of Sale > Configuration > Point of Sale*.
#. Edit the one you want to configure.
#. Enable *Print only the salesman's first name*

Usage
=====

#. Open a new PoS session.
#. Make an order and validate it.
#. You should see only the salesman's firstname on the receipt

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/pos/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/pos/issues/new?body=module:%20pos_ticket_salesman_firstname%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.

info.html_description:
On the POS ticket, prints only the salesman’s first name.

Table of contents

  • Configuration
  • Usage
  • Bug Tracker
  • Credits
    • Authors
    • Contributors
    • Maintainers

Configuration

  1. Go to Point of Sale > Configuration > Point of Sale.
  2. Edit the one you want to configure.
  3. Enable Print only the salesman’s first name

Usage

  1. Open a new PoS session.
  2. Make an order and validate it.
  3. You should see only the salesman’s firstname on the receipt

Bug Tracker

Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.

Credits

Current maintainer:
